quote: You don't look so much like a great hero,' Jarrah said. 'I'm pretty sure I'm not,' Mack said wearily. 'My throat is hoarse from screaming in terror. I don't think heroes have that problem.
quote_letters: YOU DONT LOOK SO MUCH LIKE A GREAT HERO JARRAH SAID IM PRETTY SURE IM NOT MACK SAID WEARILY MY THROAT IS HOARSE FROM SCREAMING IN TERROR I DONT THINK HEROES HAVE THAT PROBLEM
